Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.FILE_SEPARATOR
    Use File.separator directly
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.normalizeFile(String, String)
    Use ViewUtils.normalizeFile(String, String) instead
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.normalizeFolder(String)
    Use ViewUtils.normalizeFolder(String) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    io.micronaut.views.handlebars.HandlebarsViewsRenderer(ViewsConfiguration, ClassPathResourceLoader, HandlebarsViewsRendererConfiguration)
    io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf.ThymeleafViewsRenderer(ViewsConfiguration, ThymeleafViewsRendererConfiguration, ClassPathResourceLoader)
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsFilter(BeanLocator, ViewsFilterOrderProvider)
    Use ViewsFilter.ViewsFilter(BeanLocator, ViewsFilterOrderProvider, Collection) instead.
